verses.text: \w Be|strong="H1732"\w* merciful \w unto|strong="H1732"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* man \w would|strong="H1732"\w* swallow \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*: \w All|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* day \w long|strong="H7350"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* fighting oppresseth \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Mine enemies \w would|strong="H3605"\w* \w swallow|strong="H7602"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w* \w up|strong="H7602"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*; \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* many \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* proudly \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.
\w What|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am afraid, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* put \w my|strong="H3605"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3117"\w* thee.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* God (\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* praise \w his|strong="H3117"\w* word), \w In|strong="H3117"\w* God \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* put \w my|strong="H3372"\w* trust, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3372"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*; \w What|strong="H3372"\w* can flesh do \w unto|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H3372"\w*?

\w All|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* day \w long|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* wrest \w my|strong="H6213"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: \w All|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H6213"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w against|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* gather \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* hide \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w*, \w They|strong="H3117"\w* mark \w my|strong="H3605"\w* steps, \w Even|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* waited \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul.
\w Shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* escape \w by|strong="H8104"\w* iniquity? \w In|strong="H5315"\w* anger cast down \w the|strong="H8104"\w* peoples, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God.

Thou numberest \w my|strong="H5921"\w* wanderings: \w Put|strong="H3381"\w* thou \w my|strong="H5921"\w* tears \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* bottle; \w Are|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* book?

\w Then|strong="H7760"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w mine|strong="H7760"\w* enemies \w turn|strong="H7760"\w* back \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* day \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* call: \w This|strong="H7760"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* know, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5612"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* God (\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \add his\add* word), \w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* (\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \add his\add* word),

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* trust, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* not \w be|strong="H1697"\w* afraid; \w What|strong="H1697"\w* can man \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*?

\w Thy|strong="H6213"\w* vows \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*: \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* render thank offerings \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* thou hast delivered \w my|strong="H5921"\w* soul \w from|strong="H5921"\w* death: \add Hast thou\add* not \add delivered\add* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* feet \w from|strong="H5921"\w* falling, \w That|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* may walk \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w* \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* light \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* living?
